games.name: Pac-Man
games.description: Arcade game: Pac-Man. This is a test description that contains enough text to simulate real game metadata that would be loaded into memory during configuration parsing.
games.manualText: Game Manual for Pac-Man: This game was released in 1980 and belongs to the Arcade genre. It supports 1 player(s) and uses the following controls: joystick, button1. The objective varies based on the genre, but generally involves achieving high scores and completing levels or objectives.
tips: Master the basic controls before attempting advanced techniques
Pay attention to enemy patterns and timing
Practice makes perfect - don't give up!
Look for bonus opportunities and power-ups
